description: Their new and inspired 18” outseam hybrid adventure short is now constructed of 4-Way stretch, providing a quick drying, durable experience for any adventure. The latest Layover Trail short now features a self-stowing back pocket so you can pack tight and always have a trusty counterpart on hand. Featuring a drawstring closure waistband with zipper fly and front extended long zip pocket. Back patch pocket with button closure and small stash pocket at back yoke for quick cell phone storage.
name: Roark Layover Trail Shorts,18" Inseam - Mens
